start.welcome: 👋 Welcome to Ghost Stories Bot! Use /help to see available commands.
start.instructions:
🔗 Please send one of the following:

*Username with '@' symbol:*
`@username`

*Phone number with '+' symbol:*
`+19875551234`

*Direct link to a story:*
`https://t.me/username/s/1`

🌟 *Premium Access*

Premium users get:
✅ Unlimited story downloads
✅ Monitor up to {{limit}} users' active stories
✅ No cooldowns or waiting in queues

Run `/upgrade` to unlock Premium features.
You will receive a unique payment address. Invoices expire after one hour.
